description:
Job Title
Data Scientist CG60

Job Description

We are elevating our talent/skillset to advance data/analytics opportunities, to improve insights and execution on our top Patient Safety and Quality portfolio opportunities.

In this role you will be responsible for:
• Analyze data trend performance across multiple subsystems and developing operational and strategic improvement proposals to mitigate/improve significant trend changes
• Managing data extracts, data packaging for external release (to customers in a report or via Excel/PowerBI dashboards
• Compilation and analysis of data definitions, meaning, usage, labeling standards and other source system information to produce IT consumable information.

You're the right fit if you have:
• Bachelor’s degree in Math or Data Information Systems OR 4 years’ experience in data analysis/reporting (Masters highly desired)
• More than 5 years of experience in related role (experience in data analysis and/or preparing database reports (Excel and in SQL)
• Experience with Excel query/ETL processes
• Experience in PowerBI.
• Experience in Azure
• You must be able to successfully perform the following minimum Physical, Cognitive and Environmental job requirements with or without accommodation for this position.

About Philips

We are a health technology company. We built our entire company around the belief that every human matters, and we won't stop until everybody everywhere has access to the quality healthcare that we all deserve. Do the work of your life to help improve the lives of others.
• Learn more about our business.
• Discover our rich and exciting history.
• Learn more about our purpose.
• Read more about our employee benefits.

If you’re interested in this role and have many, but not all, of the experiences needed, we encourage you to apply. You may still be the right candidate for this or other opportunities at Philips. Learn more about our commitment to diversity and inclusion here.

Additional Information

US work authorization is a precondition of employment. The company will not consider candidates who require sponsorship for a work-authorized visa, now or in the future.

Company relocation benefits will not be provided for this position. For this position, you will reside in or within commuting distance to Nashville, TN. USA

Philips is an Equal Employment and Opportunity Employer/Disabled/Veteran and maintains a drug-free workplace.
